#labels Support-General
=Want to Contribute?=
Here are some ways you can contribute:
  * Post comments on the wiki! If you have anything to add or change to the wiki, just leave a comment in the appropriate wiki page! Your comments can be suggestions, encouragement, your own additions to the wiki, whatever you want!
  * Report bugs. Every time you report a bug, you are helping all other game owners and players have a more enjoyable and secure game!
  * Join our community! Our community at http://community.bbgamezone.com can use some new members that are willing to learn or willing to help new users! There are many members with varying levels of experience in game coding!

Thank you :)
